sys_update_xml.name: sp_angular_provider_f4f41d96db8293c0f59974131f9619b5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>getSavedRequestData</name><script><![CDATA[function getSavedRequestData($http){
	this.getSavedData = function(id){
		return new Promise(function(resolve, reject){	
			var req = {
				method: 'GET',
				url: '/api/naci/accountactivation/getSavedRequestData',
				beforeSend: function(xhr) {
					xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId);
				},
				headers: {
					'Content-Type': 'application/json'
				},
				params: {
					'id': id
				}
			};		
		  $http(req).then(
			function (response){
				resolve(response.data.result);	
			}, function (error){
				reject(error);
			});
		});	
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-05-15 14:28:22</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>f4f41d96db8293c0f59974131f9619b5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getSavedRequestData</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_f4f41d96db8293c0f59974131f9619b5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-05-15 14:42:48</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>accountActivationActionUpdate</name><script><![CDATA[function accountActivationActionUpdate($http){
	//params is JSON Object
	this.updateRequest = function(params, sessionId){
		return new Promise(function(resolve, reject){
			var req ={
				 url: '/api/naci/accountactivation/updateRequestAction',
				 method : "POST",
				 beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); },
				 headers: {
						'Content-Type': 'application/json'
					},
				 data : params				
			};
			$http(req).then(handleResponse, handleError);
			 function handleResponse(response){
					var result = response.data.result;
					console.log(result.status);
				}
			
				function handleError(){
					console.error(response);
					alert('ERROR');
				}
			
		});
	};			   
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-05-18 15:50:40</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>6a44c19fdb8adbc054d8ff621f9619e8</sys_id><sys_mod_count>8</sys_mod_count><sys_name>accountActivationActionUpdate</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_6a44c19fdb8adbc054d8ff621f9619e8</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-05-18 16:29:47</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>accountActivationWithdrawRequest</name><script><![CDATA[function accountActivationWithdrawRequest($http){
	this.withdraw = function(id){
		return new Promise(function(resolve, reject){	
			var req = {
				method: 'GET',
				url: '/api/naci/accountactivation/withdrawRequest',
				beforeSend: function(xhr) {
					xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId);
				},
				headers: {
					'Content-Type': 'application/json'
				},
				params: {
					'sysId': id
				}
			};		
		  $http(req).then(
			function (response){
				resolve(response.data.result);	
			}, function (error){
				reject(error);
			});
		});	
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-05-17 15:47:10</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>1fc937badb8a17c0f59974131f9619e4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>accountActivationWithdrawRequest</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_1fc937badb8a17c0f59974131f9619e4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-05-17 15:53:05</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>withdrawRequest</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
      var jsonArr = [];
	  var sysId = request.queryParams.sysId;
      var gr = new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');
      gr.addQuery('sys_id',sysId); //to delete one record
      gr.query();
      gr.next();
      gr.deleteRecord();
	
	  jsonArr.push({
		 message: "succeed" 
	  });

	return jsonArr;
	
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/accountactivation/withdrawRequest</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/withdrawRequest</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-05-17 15:44:04</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>b5797f7adb8a17c0f59974131f961905</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>withdrawRequest</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_b5797f7adb8a17c0f59974131f961905</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-05-17 16:02:39</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="accountActivation">417f868ddb8edf8054d8ff621f9619f8</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_59f572d6dbc693c0f59974131f961938
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>submitRequestData</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	names = ['name', 'title', 'id_number', 'tenure_track', 'senior_scientist', 'staff_scientist','administrative','substantial_research','need_access','oversight', 'type', 'projectId'];
    var message = '';
    var jsonData = [];
    var variables = {};
    var body = request.body.data; 
	var requested_for = body.requested_for;
	var opened_by = body.opened_by;
	var cat_item_id = body.cat_item;
	var short_description = body.short_description;
	var contact_type = body.contact_type;
	var itemIds = body.variables;
    var comments = body.comments;
	
	var gr_request = new GlideRecord('sc_request');
	
	gr_request.initialize();
	gr_request.u_cms_submitted = true;
	gr_request.requested_for = requested_for;
	gr_request.opened_by = opened_by;
	gr_request.contact_type = contact_type;
	var request_id = gr_request.insert();
	
	//create a record in sc_requested_item table
	var gr_requested_item = new GlideRecord("sc_req_item");
	gr_requested_item.initialize();
	gr_requested_item.u_cms_submitted = true;
	gr_requested_item.cat_item = cat_item_id;
	gr_requested_item.short_description = short_description;
	gr_requested_item.request = request_id;
	if(contact_type != null && contact_type != 'Web'){
		var gr_tracking = new GlideRecord('u_ccr_tracking_t');
		gr_tracking.addQuery('u_orgid',contact_type);
		gr_tracking.query();
		gr_tracking.next();
		var version = gr_tracking.getValue('u_version');
		contact_type = contact_type + "," + version;
	}
	gr_requested_item.contact_type = contact_type;
	if(comments != null && comments.length > 20){
		gr_requested_item.comments = comments;
	}
	var submitted_id = gr_requested_item.insert();
	var number = gr_requested_item.number;
	
	//create records in sc_item_option table
	for(var i = 0; i < names.length; i++){
		var gr_answers = new GlideRecord("sc_item_option");
		gr_answers.initialize();
		gr_answers.item_option_new = itemIds[names[i]];
		if(names[i] == 'projectId'){
			var gdt = new GlideDateTime(); 
			var year = gdt.getYear();
			gr_answers.value = "CA-"+ year + "-" +number.substring(8);
		}else{
			gr_answers.value =  body[names[i]];			
		}
		gr_answers.order = i+1;
		var answers_sys_id = gr_answers.insert();
		
		var gr_m2m = new GlideRecord("sc_item_option_mtom");
		gr_m2m.initialize();
		gr_m2m.sc_item_option = answers_sys_id;
		gr_m2m.request_item = submitted_id;
		gr_m2m.insert();
	}
     
	//create a record in sc_req_item table
	var gr_requested_item2 = new GlideRecord("sc_req_item");
	gr_requested_item2.get(submitted_id);
	var gdt1 = new GlideDateTime();
	gr_requested_item2.due_date = gdt1.getDisplayValue();
	gr_requested_item2.update();
	
	jsonData.push({
           submit_id: (submitted_id).toString(),
		   number: (number).toString()
     });
	
	return jsonData[0];
	
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/accountactivation/submitRequestData</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/submitRequestData</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-05-15 21:32:11</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>59f572d6dbc693c0f59974131f961938</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>submitRequestData</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_59f572d6dbc693c0f59974131f961938</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-05-15 22:14:04</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="accountActivation">417f868ddb8edf8054d8ff621f9619f8</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>accountActivationConstant</name><script><![CDATA[function accountActivationConstant() {
	this.applicationName = "AccountActivation";
	this.catItemDesc = "CBIIT Account Activation Application";
	this.names = ['name', 'title', 'id_number', 'tenure_track', 'senior_scientist', 'staff_scientist','administrative','substantial_research','need_access','oversight', 'type'];
	this.checkboxNames = ['tenure_track','senior_scientist','staff_scientist','administrative','substantial_research','need_access','oversight'];
	this.textField = ['name', 'title', 'id_number'];
	this.approvalAction = 'approved';
	this.rejectAction = 'rejected';
	this.dsRole = "Direct Supervisor";
	this.sdsoRole = "Scientific Directors / Signing Official";
	this.getApplicationName = function() {return this.applicationName;};
	this.getCatItemDesc = function() {return this.catItemDesc;};
	this.getNames = function(){return this.names};
	this.getCheckboxNames = function() {return this.checkboxNames};
	this.getTextField = function() {return this.textField;};
	this.getApprovalAction = function() {return this.approvalAction;};
	this.getRejectAction = function() {return this.rejectAction;};
	this.getDsRole = function() {return this.dsRole;};
	this.getSDSORole = function() {return this.sdsoRole;};
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-05-14 19:38:27</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>c25195cedbc693c054d8ff621f9619fe</sys_id><sys_mod_count>38</sys_mod_count><sys_name>accountActivationConstant</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_c25195cedbc693c054d8ff621f9619fe</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-05-18 16:18:13</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>accountactivationGetSubmittedRequestData</name><script><![CDATA[function accountactivationGetSubmittedRequestData($http){
	this.getSubmittedRequestData = function(id, sessionId){
			return new Promise(function(resolve, reject){	
			var req = {
				method: 'GET',
				url: '/api/naci/accountactivation/getSubmittedRequestDataById',
				beforeSend: function(xhr) {
					xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId);
				},
				headers: {
					'Content-Type': 'application/json'
				},
				params: {
					'id': id
				}
			};		
		  $http(req).then(
			function (response){
				resolve(response.data.result);	
			}, function (error){
				reject(error);
			});
		});	
	};
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-05-16 21:23:01</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>646dbb6adbced3c0f59974131f9619aa</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>accountactivationGetSubmittedRequestData</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_646dbb6adbced3c0f59974131f9619aa</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-05-18 15:53:23</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_4c4c8ed6db4693c0f59974131f961953
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getCatId</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    var result = {};
	
	var gr_cat_items = new GlideRecord('sc_cat_item');
      gr_cat_items.addQuery('short_description', 'CBIIT Account Activation Application');
      gr_cat_items.query();
	  gr_cat_items.next();
	var cat_id = gr_cat_items.getValue('sys_id');
	result.id = cat_id;	
	return result;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/accountactivation/getCatId</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getCatId</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-05-15 18:31:45</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>4c4c8ed6db4693c0f59974131f961953</sys_id><sys_mod_count>7</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getCatId</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_4c4c8ed6db4693c0f59974131f961953</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-05-15 19:26:20</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="accountActivation">417f868ddb8edf8054d8ff621f9619f8</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getSavedRequestData</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

    savedData = {};
    var  id = request.queryParams.id;
	
	var appName = "AccountActivation";
	var gr_saved_items = new GlideRecord('u_dceg_rrs_saved_request');
	    gr_saved_items.addQuery('u_application_name', appName); 
		gr_saved_items.addQuery('sys_id', id);
        gr_saved_items.orderByDesc('sys_created_on');
        gr_saved_items.query();
		gr_saved_items.next();	
	    savedData = JSON.parse(gr_saved_items.getDisplayValue('u_value'));
    
	return savedData;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/accountactivation/getSavedRequestData</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getSavedRequestData</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-05-14 22:13:48</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>cdb5f90edb4a93c054d8ff621f96198d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getSavedRequestData</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_cdb5f90edb4a93c054d8ff621f96198d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-05-15 14:52:35</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="accountActivation">417f868ddb8edf8054d8ff621f9619f8</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_9aeeff6edbced3c0f59974131f9619f2
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getSubmittedRequestDataById</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	var sysId = request.queryParams.id;	
	var gr_requested_items = new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');
		gr_requested_items.addQuery('sys_id', sysId);
		gr_requested_items.orderByDesc('number');
		gr_requested_items.query();
		gr_requested_items.next();
	var item = {};
    var comments =  gr_requested_items.comments.getJournalEntry(-1);
	var variables = gr_requested_items.variables;
	
	item.name =  variables.name.toString();
	item.title = variables.title.toString();
	item.id_number = variables.id_number.toString();
	item.type = variables.type.toString();
	item.tenure_track = variables.tenure_track;
	item.senior_scientist = variables.senior_scientist;
	item.staff_scientist = variables.staff_scientist;
	item.administrative = variables.administrative;
	item.substantial_research = variables.substantial_research;
	item.need_access = variables.need_access;
	item.oversight = variables.oversight;
	item.comments = comments;
	return item;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/accountactivation/getSubmittedRequestDataById</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getSubmittedRequestDataById</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-05-16 21:36:00</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>9aeeff6edbced3c0f59974131f9619f2</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getSubmittedRequestDataById</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_9aeeff6edbced3c0f59974131f9619f2</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-05-18 21:04:46</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="accountActivation">417f868ddb8edf8054d8ff621f9619f8</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sp_angular_provider_3cd9d546db0a93c054d8ff621f961901
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>saveRequestData</name><script><![CDATA[function saveRequestData($http) {
	this.saveData = function (data, sessionId){
		var request = {
				url: '/api/naci/accountactivation/saveUserData',
				method: 'POST',
				beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); },
				headers: {
					'Content-Type': 'application/json'
				},
				data: data			
		}
		
		$http(request).then(handleResponse, handleError);
		function handleResponse(response){
			var result = response.data.result;
		}
		function handleError(response){
			console.error(response);
			alert('ERROR');
		}
	}
	
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-05-14 20:12:43</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>3cd9d546db0a93c054d8ff621f961901</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>saveRequestData</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_3cd9d546db0a93c054d8ff621f961901</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-05-14 20:48:21</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

"); $('#removeDraftDiv').modal('show'); } $scope.removeDraftRecord = function(){ $('#removeDraftDiv').modal('hide'); callDeleteSave(); } $scope.closeRequestConfirm = function(){ $('#removeDraftDiv').modal('hide'); } function callDeleteSave(){ var data = getDeleteParam(); var param = JSON.stringify(data); var request = { url: '/api/naci/processdata/savedata', method: 'POST', beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); }, headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, data: param }; $http(request).then(handleResponse, handleError); function handleResponse(response){ var result = response.data.result; } function handleError(response){ console.error(response); alert('ERROR'); } } function getDeleteParam(){ var variables ={}; variables.action = 'delete'; variables.user_id = userId; variables.applicationName = applicationName; variables.savedId = recId; return [variables]; } function loadSavedDetails(id){ clearForm(); $('#resubmit').hide(); $('#submit').show(); $('#save').show(); getSavedRequestById(id); } function getSavedRequestById(id){ var request = { url: '/api/naci/getdata/getDataById', method: 'GET', beforeSend: function(xhr){ xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId); }, headers: { 'Content-Type': 'application/json' }, params: {savedId: id} }; $http(request).then(handleResponse, handleError); function handleResponse(response){ var variables = response.data.result[0].variable; for(key in variables){ if(textFields.indexOf(key) > -1){ if(key == 'requestDate' || key == 'needDate'){ $('#'+key).val(getConvertedValue(variables[key], 1)); }else{ $('#'+key).val(variables[key]); if(key == 'whereRun'){ if(variables[key] == 'other'){ $('#otherPlace').show(); }else{ $('#otherPlace').hide(); } } } }else{ if(variables[key] == 'true'){ $('#'+key).prop('checked', true); if(key == 'otherTask'){ $('#otherTaskValue').prop('disabled', false); } }else{ $('#'+key).prop('checked', false); } } } $('#hideValue').val(id); $('#newProposal').modal('show'); } function handleError(response){ console.error(response); alert('ERROR'); } } function clearForm(){ for(var index=0; index < names.length; index++) { if(textFields.indexOf(names[index]) != -1 ){ $('#'+names[index]).val(''); }else{ $('#'+names[index]).prop('checked', false); } } $('#otherTaskValue').prop('disabled', true); $('#otherPlace').hide(); } function getConvertedValue(value, flag){ if(!value || 0 == value.length){ return ""; } var values = ''; if(flag == '0'){ values = value.split('/'); return values[0]+'-'+values[1] + '-' + values[2]; }else { values = value.split('-'); return values[0]+'/'+values[1] + '/' + values[2]; } } spUtil.recordWatch($scope, "u_dceg_rrs_saved_request", "", function(name, data) { spUtil.update($scope); }); }]]>csp_instancefalseddptfalseDCEG Draft Proposal Table falsefalsesp_widgetzhoujim@nih.gov2018-01-23 19:22:09false38062d5edb73cb0054d8ff621f96196977DCEG Draft Proposal Table globalfalseglobalsp_widget_38062d5edb73cb0054d8ff621f961969zhoujim@nih.gov2018-05-17 20:23:36

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_c980598edbc693c054d8ff621f9619a5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>saveUserData</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    var message = '';
    var jsonData = [];
    var variables = {};
    var body = request.body.data; //this string will be saved into database
	var action = body.action;
	var userId = body.userId;
	var appName = body.applicationName;
   
	for(key in body){
		variables[key] = body[key];
	}
	
	var saveData = JSON.stringify(variables);
	
	if(action == 'add'){
        var save_request = new GlideRecord('u_dceg_rrs_saved_request');
        save_request.initialize();
        save_request.u_value = saveData;
        save_request.u_userid = userId;
        save_request.u_application_name = appName;
        message = save_request.insert();
     }else if(action == 'update'){
       var existId = variables['savedId'];
       var update_request = new GlideRecord('u_dceg_rrs_saved_request');
       update_request.addQuery('sys_id',existId);
       update_request.query();
       update_request.next();
       update_request.u_value = saveData;
       update_request.u_userid = userId;
       update_request.u_application_name = appName;
       answers_sys_id = update_request.update();                    
     }else if(action == 'delete'){
         var saved_id =variables['savedId'];
         var delete_request = new GlideRecord('u_dceg_rrs_saved_request');
         delete_request.addQuery('sys_id',saved_id);
         delete_request.query();
         delete_request.next();
         answers_sys_id = delete_request.deleteRecord();
         message = saved_id;
     }else{
         message = "Invalid action.";
     }
     jsonData.push({
           message: message,
     });
                
     return jsonData;

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/accountactivation/saveUserData</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/saveUserData</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-05-14 19:30:50</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>c980598edbc693c054d8ff621f9619a5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>saveUserData</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_c980598edbc693c054d8ff621f9619a5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-05-14 20:54:40</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="accountActivation">417f868ddb8edf8054d8ff621f9619f8</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_7ebfc68ddb8edf8054d8ff621f961991
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>fetchUserList</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	 var users = [];
	 var searchCriteria = request.queryParams.term.toString();
	 var term = searchCriteria.split(" ");
	 var length = term.length;
	 var firstName = term[0];
	 var lastName = term.pop();

	var user_item = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
	     user_item.addQuery('first_name', 'STARTSWITH', firstName);
         if(length > 1) {
			 user_item.addQuery('last_name', 'STARTSWITH', lastName);
		 }
         user_item.query();
	 //var index = 0;
     while(user_item.next()){
		 var value = user_item.getDisplayValue('first_name') + " " + user_item.getDisplayValue('last_name');
		 var label = value;
		 var id = user_item.getDisplayValue('sys_id');
		 var email = user_item.getDisplayValue('email');
		 var phone = user_item.getDisplayValue('phone');
		 var title = user_item.getDisplayValue('title');
		 var id_number = user_item.getDisplayValue('employee_number');
		 if (email) {
			 label += "  [" + email + "]";
		 }
		 users.push({label: label, value: value, id: id, email: email, phone: phone, title: title, id_number: id_number});
		 
//		 users.push({'list':{label: label, value: value}, 'fistName': user_item.getDisplayValue('first_name'), 'lastName':user_item.getDisplayValue('last_name'), 'id': user_item.getDisplayValue('sys_id')});
     }
   
     return users;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/accountactivation/fetchUserList</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/fetchUserList</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-05-11 21:32:56</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>7ebfc68ddb8edf8054d8ff621f961991</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>fetchUserList</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_7ebfc68ddb8edf8054d8ff621f961991</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-05-23 13:59:06</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="accountActivation">417f868ddb8edf8054d8ff621f9619f8</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_02a7c957dbcadbc054d8ff621f9619d9
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>POST</http_method><name>updateRequestAction</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
	   var jsonObj = {};
	   var data = request.body.data;
       var approval_id = data.approval_id;
       var comments = data.approval_comments;
       var action= data.action;
       var role = data.role;

       var gr1 = new GlideRecord("sysapproval_approver");
       gr1.addQuery("sys_id", approval_id);
       gr1.query();
       gr1.next();
       gr1.state=action;
       gr1.comments.setJournalEntry( '(' + action + ') ' +comments + '(role)' + role + '(ENDROLE)' + gs.getUser().getFirstName() + ' ' + gs.getUser().getLastName() + 'ENDCOMMENTS', gs.getUserID());
       gr1.update();
	   
	   jsonObj = {
		   status : data
	   };
	
	  return jsonObj;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/accountactivation/updateRequestAction</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/updateRequestAction</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-05-18 16:07:35</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>02a7c957dbcadbc054d8ff621f9619d9</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>updateRequestAction</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_02a7c957dbcadbc054d8ff621f9619d9</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-05-18 19:56:43</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="accountActivation">417f868ddb8edf8054d8ff621f9619f8</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>accountActivationUtil</name><script><![CDATA[function accountActivationUtil(){
	this.setButtonOnDisplayPage = function(type){
		if(type == 'PI'){
			$('#okDiv').show();
			$('#commentTextarea').hide();
			$('#dsActionDiv').hide();
		}else if(type == 'DS'){
			$('#okDiv').hide();
			$('#commentTextarea').show();
			$('#dsActionDiv').show();			
		}
	}
} ]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-05-18 13:42:37</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>6b37e4d7dbc6dbc054d8ff621f96199a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>accountActivationUtil</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_6b37e4d7dbc6dbc054d8ff621f96199a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-05-18 13:58:26</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sp_angular_provider"><sp_angular_provider action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><name>accountActivationSubmission</name><script><![CDATA[function accountActivationSubmission($http) {
	this.submitRequest = function (param, sessionId){
		return new Promise(function(resolve, reject){	
			var req = {
				method: 'POST',
				url: '/api/naci/accountactivation/submitRequestData',
				beforeSend: function(xhr) {
					xhr.setRequestHeader('X-UserToken', sessionId);
				},
				headers: {
					'Content-Type': 'application/json'
				},
				data: param
			};		
		  $http(req).then(
			function (response){
				resolve(response.data);	
			}, function (error){
				reject(error);
			});
	 }
 )};
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sp_angular_provider</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-05-15 21:25:34</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>2e64ba96dbc693c0f59974131f96192d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>accountActivationSubmission</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sp_angular_provider_2e64ba96dbc693c0f59974131f96192d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-05-15 22:14:41</sys_updated_on><type>service</type></sp_angular_provider></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_ws_operation_c4239a9edb4693c0f59974131f9619a5
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>getItemArray</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
    var names = ['name', 'title', 'id_number', 'tenure_track', 'senior_scientist', 'staff_scientist','administrative','substantial_research','need_access','oversight', 'type', 'projectId'];
	var variables = {};
	var result = {};
	var gr = new GlideRecord("question");
			gr.addQuery("sys_updated_by", 'zhoujim@nih.gov');
			gr.orderBy("order");
			gr.query();

	while(gr.next()){
	   var name =  gr.getValue('name');
	   for(var i = 0; i < names.length; i++){
		   if(name == names[i]){
				variables[name] = gr.getValue('sys_id');
				break;
		   }
	   }
	}
	result.variables = variables; 
   return result;
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/accountactivation/getItemArray</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/getItemArray</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2018-05-15 19:01:06</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>c4239a9edb4693c0f59974131f9619a5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getItemArray</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_c4239a9edb4693c0f59974131f9619a5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-05-15 22:20:52</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="accountActivation">417f868ddb8edf8054d8ff621f9619f8</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>

sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl/><http_method>GET</http_method><name>withdrawRequest</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process(/*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {
      var jsonArr = [];
	  var sysId = request.queryParams.sysId;
      var gr = new GlideRecord('sc_req_item');
      gr.addQuery('sys_id',sysId); //to delete one record
      gr.query();
      gr.next();
      gr.deleteRecord();
	
	  jsonArr.push({
		 message: "succeed" 
	  });

	return jsonArr;
	
})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/naci/processdata/withdrawRequest</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/withdrawRequest</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>false</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2017-02-09 15:08:39</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>true</sys_customer_update><sys_id>71d22896dbfc7a0054d8ff621f9619aa</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>withdrawRequest</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_71d22896dbfc7a0054d8ff621f9619aa</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>zhoujim@nih.gov</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2018-05-17 16:02:30</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="ProcessData">6c22654bdbf22200e92cff621f9619d7</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
